text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On a clear blue day, I decide to have<n>lunch on the roof... But
when I go up, I<n>see that someone's beaten me there.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh... Sure! Oh good, it sounds like<n>everyone's doing
well.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Me? Yeah, I'm getting along fine... Oh,<n>you heard about the
tryout race?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Uh, yeah, about that... You see, I<n>haven't found a trainer yet.
Right, so<n>my debut's gonna have to stay on<n>hold—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, it's not that they're not good<n>enough! They're just...
you know,<n>missing something.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh... Mhm, thanks. I know you're<n>all rooting for me, so I
won't let you<n>down!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: All right then... Okay, talk to you later.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Pheeeeew...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wah! Oh, it's you...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wah! Oh, it's you...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, were you planning on having<n>lunch here? Sorry for
taking up the<n>place.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
You sure know how to pick a spot.<n>Eating up here in this
lovely<n>weather's a wonderful idea.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
You sure know how to pick a spot.<n>Eating up here in this
lovely<n>weather's a wonderful idea.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: It would be really refreshing...Sigh.
choice_data_list: I take it the call didn't go well?
I take it the call didn't go well?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hm? Oh, the call just now?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, not at all! Those were my cute<n>little juniors back
home. I enjoy<n>talking to them all the time!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
We've kept in touch since I switched<n>schools and came to
Tracen. They're<n>good kids.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, if they hadn't talked me<n>into it, I'd never have
considered<n>coming to the academy.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Haha, is it that unbelievable? Well,<n>it's true.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
You mentioned it before, but I only run<n>because of how
much fun I have<n>doing it.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
You mentioned it before, but I only run<n>because of how
much fun I have<n>doing it.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
But before I knew it, everyone was<n>looking up to me... They
told me they<n>want to see me out there winning.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm like their big sis—how could I let<n>them down?
choice_data_list: And so you joined Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that's right. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well, that's all there is to it, I guess.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Ah, Maruzensky! Hey,<n>Maruzenskyyy!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh! Heeey! Off to do some training?<n>Keep it up!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Thaaanks! I'm gonna put everything<n>you taught me to good
use! See you!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Have fuuun! And stay safe out there!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe, isn't she cute?
choice_data_list:
I see you're popular with the younger students
here too.

I see you're popular with the younger students
here too.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm really grateful. They're all such<n>nice kids.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
And that one—she has a terribly shy<n>little sister who was so
scared to go<n>out, she'd just stay cooped up in her<n>room.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
But they went and saw the Twinkle<n>Series together and had
loads of fun.<n>Now she's not scared to go out at all.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
The older one wants to keep showing<n>her sister more
amazing things, so<n>that's why she's trying so hard here<n>
at school.
choice_data_list: What a nice goal to have.
What a nice goal to have.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Isn't it?! I think it's just fantastic!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Like a dazzling dream even.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hey, what's your dream? I really<n>wanna know!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hey, what's your dream? I really<n>wanna know!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
For a training specialist at the famous<n>Tracen Academy, I
bet yours is to train<n>a G1 racer, right? Or maybe you have<n>
more worldly ambitions?
choice_data_list: Sure, I'd be proud to train someone like that.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Of course. That's what every trainer<n>wants, right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
The trainers here especially are all<n>excellent. They're really
driven to<n>succeed.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I... wish I had the same energy to<n>match it.
choice_data_list: You shouldn't push yourself if it's not there.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well, look at you. You really are<n>strange, just like I thought.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well, look at you. You really are<n>strange, just like I thought.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hmmm...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Listen for a sec. At this very moment,<n>on this roof, there's a
trainer and a<n>racer, both of whom are free.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Listen for a sec. At this very moment,<n>on this roof, there's a
trainer and a<n>racer, both of whom are free.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
And you like my running so much that<n>I catch you watching
me whenever<n>you can.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
And you like my running so much that<n>I catch you watching
me whenever<n>you can.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
My heart's dancing, 'cause I've<n>finally met a trainer who
isn't all gung<n>ho about winning the biggest prize.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
So, in light of our present<n>circumstances... is there anything<n>
special you'd like to ask me?
choice_data_list: I'd love to be your trainer, if you'll have me.
I'd love to be your trainer, if you'll have me.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
So, in light of our present<n>circumstances... is there anything<n>
special you'd like to ask me?
choice_data_list: I'd love to be your trainer, if you'll have me.
I'd love to be your trainer, if you'll have me.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, good, you know how to take<n>a hint! And you nailed
it. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, good, you know how to take<n>a hint! And you nailed
it. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: ...Thank you. I'd love to have you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I look forward to working together,<n>Trainer!
